Why Join Us?
Growth Opportunities: Thrive in an environment full of growth prospects.
Vibrant Team Culture: Be part of a dynamic and supportive team.

About Us
We are a premier e-commerce growth agency that specializes in running Facebook and Instagram ads for e-commerce brands. As a Premium Agency Partner with Meta, we're at the cutting edge of digital advertising.
Perks Include:
Paid public holidays
Generous leave entitlements
Unlimited bonus potential
Career growth pathway – we’re here to develop leaders, not just freelancers or side hustlers!

Role Expectations
We're on the lookout for a Visual Creator who's ready to dive into the exciting world of social media ad marketing. If you're a pro at creating fun and engaging ad contents (Meta, Instagram,, TikTok), comfortable exchanging and collaborating ideas within a team, and love seeing businesses grow through your creation, then you might just be our perfect fit!

Your roles and responsibilities are broken down into, but are not limited to:
Produce performing and visually appealing digital marketing ads for our clients 
Produce successful iterations based on performance metrics and hypotheses. 
Think outside the box and conceptualize creative ad ideas during brainstorming and/or campaign planning.
Facilitate meetings when pitching creative ideas to develop ads for our clients.
Learn and understand media buying success metrics to adapt formulating creative ad ideas. 
Learn and adapt digital marketing strategic approaches in formulating creative ad ideas. 
Review creative needs/assets in preparation for conceptualizing and executing creative.
Maintain standard internal management processes. 
Proactively and openly communicate with key stakeholders.
Dedicating time and willingness for professional and personal-self development.

Participate and contribute to department projects that align with the company’s mission and vision.

Learn and adapt to new processes and sudden changes as Right Hook is a rapid growing company
Assist to achieve great team culture through preserving Right Hook’s core values.

GROWTH OR DEATH - WE ARE WHAT WE TOLERATE"

Job Requirements
Shift Hours: flexible to work in sync either AUS or USA timezone. 
AUS : 9am - 6pm PHT 
USA : 7pm - 4am PHT 
High Proficiency in using Adobe Creative Cloud Applications. 
Advanced English proficiency (both written and spoken).
Fast and reliable PC/MAC that supports Adobe Creative Cloud Applications. 
Fast and internet connection with available backup
Possess critical thinking skills + be able to work autonomously.
Be able to accept feedback and continuously work on improving your skills.
Be hungry for personal growth. Never satisfied with status-quo.
Be a great team player, an awesome communicator, and enjoy a good challenge.
Highly organized and able to manage several projects and clients every day + show resourcefulness.
Great Attention to Detail
Effective and strong communication skills- written and oral (persuasive, influential, relationship-building)
Knows workaround with ClickUp (or similar platform), G-Suite, Facebook Business Manager, Shopify
Solid experience in Project Management and Client Facing Communications Roles.
Basic to Intermediate understanding of e-Commerce Advertising, media buying, and multi/cross-channel marketing (Paid Social (Meta), Google, e-Mail)
Background in Scrum-Sprint is a plus but not required.
Previous experience working with a remote team and marketing agency
Note: This is a full-time, 40-hour-per-week job. We require that you have a camera on your computer because you are required to be on video calls with our team.
